keys: Ciencias SESE. Fuerzas de energía. Hoja de trabajo

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>3406</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Conducting an Investigation</string>
            <string language="es">Realizar una investigación</string>
            <string language="ga">Fiosrúchán a Dhéanamh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leiten einer Untersuchung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conduite d'une recherche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conduzindo uma investigação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Condotta della ricerca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διεξαγωγή μιας έρευνας</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Instructions on how to investigate the distance that a toy car travels when launched down a ramp. Children can record ideas, observations and measurements.</string>
            <string language="es">Instrucciones para investigar la distancia que un coche de juguete viaja cuando se lanza hacia abajo desde una rampa. Los niños pueden anotar ideas, observaciones y medidas.</string>
            <string language="ga">Treoracha chun an fad a thaistealaíonn carr bréige nuair a chuirtear síos rampa é a fhiosrú. Is féidir le leanaí smaointe, breathnuithe agus tomhais a thaifead.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SESE Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencias SESE. Fuerzas de energía. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">SESE Eolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">EnergyForces</string>
            <string language="ga">EnergyForces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anweisungen in, wie man den Abstand nachforscht, 
daß ein Spielzeugauto reist, wenn es hinunter eine Rampe ausgestoßen
wird. Kinder können Ideen, Beobachtungen und Messen speichern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Instructions sur la façon dont étudier la 
distance qu'une voiture de jouet voyage une fois lancée en bas d'une 
rampe. Les enfants peuvent enregistrer des idées, des 
observations et des mesures.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instruções em como investigar a distância que 
um carro do brinquedo viaja quando lançado abaixo uma rampa. As
crianças podem gravar idéias, observações e medidas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Istruzioni su come studiare la distanza che un 
automobile del giocattolo viaggia una volta lanciato giù un 
dilagare. I bambini possono registrare le idee, le 
osservazioni e le misure.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οδηγίες για το πώς να ερευνήσει την απόσταση που 
ταξίδια παιχνιδιών αυτοκινήτων όταν προωθείται κάτω από μια 
κεκλιμένη ράμπα. Τα παιδιά μπορούν να καταγράψουν τις 
ιδέες, τις παρατηρήσεις και τις μετρήσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SESE Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">EnergyForces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">EnergyForces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">EnergyForces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
